document.heading: Retirement of Public-School Teachers Omnibus Amendment Act of 2012

history.narrative: Law 19-312, the “Retirement of Public-School Teachers Omnibus Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-1017. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 4, 2012, and December 18, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 15, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-680 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-312 became effective on May 1, 2013.
